scripts.start: cross-env DOT_ENV="local" NODE_ENV="production" PUBLIC_PATH="/" webpack-cli serve --mode development --open --config ./config/webpack.config.js --hot --inline
scripts.start:dev: cross-env DOT_ENV="development" NODE_ENV="production" PUBLIC_PATH="/" webpack-cli serve --mode development --open --config ./config/webpack.config.js --hot --inline
scripts.start:stg: cross-env DOT_ENV="staging" NODE_ENV="production" PUBLIC_PATH="/" webpack-cli serve --mode development --open --config ./config/webpack.config.js --hot --inline
scripts.start:prod: cross-env DOT_ENV="production" NODE_ENV="production" PUBLIC_PATH="/" webpack-cli serve --mode development --open --config ./config/webpack.config.js --hot --inline
scripts.build: cross-env DOT_ENV="local" NODE_ENV="local" PUBLIC_PATH="./" webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:dev: cross-env DOT_ENV="development" NODE_ENV="development" PUBLIC_PATH="./" webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:stg: cross-env DOT_ENV="staging" NODE_ENV="staging" PUBLIC_PATH="./" webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:prod: cross-env DOT_ENV="production" NODE_ENV="staging" PUBLIC_PATH="./" webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js --mode development
